document_data.name: Osber
document_data.mainbody: '''Osber''' was a thief in service to the [[Zhentarim]] living in [[Cormyr]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He carried at least one poisoned knife, which held [[sleep poison]].
document_data.Relationships: He was known to [[Baergasra]], a local undercover [[Harper]], to have a number of thugs in his service; three of them were not with him in the evening he attempted to capture Shandril.
document_data.History:
Late in the {{yearlinkName|1357}}, Osber was at the [[Wanton Wyvern]] inn near the [[Hullack Forest]] when [[Shandril Shessair]], [[Mirt]], [[Narm Tamaraith]], and [[Delg Ironstar]] entered. When Shandril Shessair attracted some attention by falling asleep and then waking up, Osber approached them and recognized her as the waif wanted by the [[Zhentarim]]. He hurled accusations and then attacked the group together with six of his underlings. Before he was slain by Delg alongside his team, he managed to poison Narm.

Baergasra later revealed his name was Osber, with some details about him.
